name: Massive IT Solutions
overview:
At Massive IT solutions We offer a broad array of dedicated services. Our offerings include cost-effective development of software applications, quality assurance, software testing, web design, and Linux system administration.

Why Software outsourcing?

Software outsourcing can reduce costs and improve cash flow, whether you are starting out or manging a large company. In addition to the economic benefits of Software outsourcing development at general, At Massive We offer our Software outsourcing service in form of hourly rate, That mean you will not asking for a Fixed-price high rate to cover expenses and unforeseen delays. We charging you only for the amount of time that you want.

Why choosing us to be your Software outsourcing development partner?

-We only hire employees with minimum 3 years experience, With average team experience of 5 years in IT field Leave no chance for newbies mistakes, and overrated hourly rate. -Our features-full customer portal provide a work hours report with a screen-shots from employee screen as he/she working on your task. -We Guarantee 100% Satisfaction, at any time, you are not completely happy with the results, let us know. We’ll make it right or cheerfully refund full amount of task price.
